effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Fortifying Brew for 6.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 8 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: When you gain  Luck of the Draw!, your next 2 casts of Blackout Kick deal 250% increased damage and incur a 2.0 sec reduced cooldown.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 117,913 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

name: 85-Year Tenure Ring
description: A small token awarded by the BEE.E.O. to those who dedicate their entire lives to service.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 7,957 to 9,725 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 295 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 398 Agility up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 68,231 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 155,079.

Equip: Gain a high chance to follow up your attacks with a fiery gilded uppercut, dealing 245,730 Fire damage to your target. Molten gold continues to splatter to deal 68,259 Fire damage over 5 sec to all nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 8 enemies.
